<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4586</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">pH Rainbow Tube</string>
            <string language="es">Tubo con efecto de arco iris para ver el pH</string>
            <string language="ga">Feadán Tuar Ceatha pH</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pH Regenbogen-Gefäß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tube d'arc-en-ciel de pH</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tubo do arco-íris do pH</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tubo del Rainbow di pH</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σωλήνας ουράνιων τόξων pH</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Eye-catching teacher demonstration where a whole spectrum of colours representing different pH values are illustrated by mixing acid and alkali in a long glass tube.</string>
            <string language="es">Demostración llamativa del profesor donde se muestra un completo espectro de colores que representan diferentes valores de pH, cuando se mezcla ácido y alcalino en un tubo largo de vidrio.</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh múinteora a bheireann ar an tsúil ina bhfeictear réimse iomlán dathanna a léiríonn luachanna difriúla pH trí aigéad agus alcaile a mheascadh i bhfeadán fada gloine.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">Química</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceimic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Experiment</string>
            <string language="es">Experimento</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ins Auge fallende Lehrerdemonstration, in der ein 
vollständiges Spektrum der Farben, die unterschiedliche pH-Werte 
darstellen, veranschaulicht werden, indem man Säure und Alkali in 
einem langen Glasgefäß mischt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration attirante de professeur où un 
éventail entier couleurs représentant différentes valeurs du pH 
sont illustrés en mélangeant l'acide et l'alcali dans un long tube 
de verre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração atraente do professor onde um 
spectrum inteiro das cores que representam valores de pH diferentes é
ilustrado misturando o ácido e o alcalóide em um tubo de vidro 
longo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione eye-catching dell'insegnante dove 
una gamma intera di colori che rappresentano i gradi di pH differenti 
è illustrata mescolando l'acido e l'alcali in un tubo di vetro lungo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευδιάκριτη επίδειξη δασκάλων όπου ολόκληρο ένα 
φάσμα των χρωμάτων που αντιπροσωπεύουν τις διαφορετικές τιμές 
pH διευκρινίζεται με τη μίξη του οξέος και του αλκαλίου σε 
έναν μακρύ σωλήνα γυαλιού.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
